entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thundershower. High 25. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Risk of a thundershower early in the evening. Fog patches developing in the evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 11 May 2023
